messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Guns and boys-Julie
messages.msgSnippet: I have been missing two sets of vaccum cleaner tubes in the last two years!  We also go to the hardware store and he buys the piece that holds the toilet paper
messages.messageBody:
I have been missing two sets of vaccum cleaner tubes
in the last two years! We also go to the hardware
store and he buys the piece that holds the toilet
paper on the toilet paper holder that and a big roll
of tape and my son is content the rest of the day.

Leslie
--- Julie Stauffer <jnjstau@...> wrote:
> <<and enhances guns with recyclable material around
> the house>>
>
> Boy does this sound familiar. Zach (9) just
> yesterday had a toy double
> barrel shotgun that he had enhanced. He took the
> tube attachment off my
> vacuum cleaner and taped it to the gun as a scope.
> He then spent much of
> the afternoon hunting deer in the back yard :)
>
> Julie
>
>

messages.subject: Guns and boys
messages.msgSnippet: Boy does this sound familiar.  Zach (9) just yesterday had a toy double barrel shotgun that he
messages.messageBody:
<<and enhances guns with recyclable material around the house>>

Boy does this sound familiar. Zach (9) just yesterday had a toy double
barrel shotgun that he had enhanced. He took the tube attachment off my
vacuum cleaner and taped it to the gun as a scope. He then spent much of
the afternoon hunting deer in the back yard :)

Julie
